title: WTF: Dude Steals Guitar By Stuffing It In His Pants, Casually Walking Away [News]
text:
UG News editor since early 2013. King Crimson fan. I handle the news around here. Posted 6 hours ago 10 
Today in Texas, an unidentified dude stole a guitar from Guitar Center in Fort Worth by stuffing it into his pants and casually walking out of the store. 
According to Fox 4 , the crime took place on January 18 at the 8900 block of Tehama Ridge Parkway. 
The guitar in question is a sunburst Fender. Footage from one of the store's security camera is available below.
